cs155.jray

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs155.jray.Texture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckerTexture, ImageTexture

    public class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    The super class of all textures. It defines a map from texture coordinates to Color3D objects Textures can be scaled and translated.
